subject: Horse Racing
Breeders' Cup (Horse Race)
lead_paragraph: Red Giant and Tropic Storm were declared out of their respective Breeders’ Cup races. Red Giant, a 4-year-old colt, was one of the favorites in the $2 million Turf next weekend at Santa Anita in California. He did not finish his feed from the previous night and had a high temperature Sunday. The trainer Craig Dollase said Tropic Storm was out because of a soft tissue injury. Tropic Storm, a 4-year-old colt, was pre-entered in the Sprint and the Turf Sprint.
